presentation.presentation2: And I'am a front-end developer and I love what I do!

whatIDoCards.title: Websites
whatIDoCards.extra: I develop responsive and fast web pages.

whatIDoCards.title: Mobile
whatIDoCards.extra: I develop mobile applications, from the creation stage to publication.

whatIDoCards.title: SEO
whatIDoCards.extra: I take care of and optimize the website’s indexing in search engines.

whoIAm.title: Welcome!
whoIAm.subtitle: A little about me . . .
whoIAm.infoAboutMe: I graduated from the Faculdade de Tecnologia de Ribeirão Preto (FATEC - RP) and from the beginning I fell in love with Front-End. So I studied and learned until I got my first job. So, today, I have several experiences in different technologies focused on this area and I continue to want to improve them.
